CustomField.formula: IF( AND( OR( ISPICKVAL(pse__Billing_Type__c,"Time and Materials"), ISPICKVAL(pse__Billing_Type__c,"Partner Prime") ), NOT(Total_Milestone_Amount__c = 0) ), "All Milestone should have a 0 Amount", IF( AND( ISPICKVAL(pse__Billing_Type__c,"Blended"), Total_Milestone_Amount__c = 0 ), "Missing Milestone Amount", IF( AND( CONTAINS(TEXT(pse__Project_Status__c),"Open"), NOT(pse__Bookings__c=Total_Milestone_Amount__c) ), "Missing Milestone Amount", IF( AND( CONTAINS(TEXT(pse__Project_Status__c),"Closed"), NOT(pse__Bookings__c=Total_Milestone_Amount__c), NOT(Total_Milestone_Amount__c=Approved_Milestone_Amount__c) ), "Missing or Unapproved Milestone Amount", "" ) ) ) )
CustomField.label: Project Amount Audit
